channel.title: 2 Problems
channel.description:
Problem 1. : If I Wear A Helm Of Neitzo Or D fire shield it comes to my weapon how i fix that.
Problem2. : ok i added npc's and i added drops but if i attack they have like 9999hp i want 200hp or somthing how i fix that?
Thank you if you post ~bored.

item.title: 2 Problems
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

1: u need to add the id of the helm and dfs to the correct spots… go to cgf click on items add the id to the right spot… self explanitory after ur there it will say “helm” add the id there “shield” add the id there

2: im not sure about that but id say go to ur npc list and lower there hp… it will say npc name/ combat\ and health… just lower the health(not sure if that’s it but that’s how i give mine more hp)

Read full topic
